column12: Boeing's latest long-range mid-sized wide-body boasts the first commercial use of composite material in both the body and wings.  This leads to weight savings and great fuel economy. Replace your 767s?
This stretched version of the 8 boasts more seating while maintaining similar fuel economy.  Replace your 767-400s?
This even more stretched version of the 9  boasts more seating with a small cut to the maximum range.  Compare to the Airbus A-350.
Airbus' new wide-body twin-jet.  This uses carbon-fiber based polymers similar to the 787 for reduced weight and better fuel economy.  Replace your A330s?
